Deprecated API

Contents

  • Deprecated Methods
  • Deprecated Methods 
    Method and Description
    com.genband.kandy.api.services.chats.KandyChatSettings.getDownloadMediaPath()
    use IKandyChatDownloadPathBuilder instead
    com.genband.kandy.api.services.groups.KandyGroupSettings.getDownloadMediaPath()
    use IKandyGroupDownloadPathBuilder instead
    com.genband.kandy.api.services.chats.IKandyChatService.markAsReceived(IKandyEvent, KandyResponseListener)
    use IKandyEvent.markAsReceived(KandyResponseListener) instead.
    com.genband.kandy.api.provisioning.IKandyProvisioning.requestCode(KandyValidationMethoud, String, String, KandyResponseListener)
    Please use IKandyProvisioning.requestCode(KandyValidationMethoud, String, String, String, KandyResponseListener)

    Subscriber Provisioning

    You can add subscribers in two ways:

    • Admin – can create (multiple) subscribers directly using the web GUI.

      click the link: https://portal.kandy.io/my-kandy
      and click on: Manage

    • Users – can create individual subscribers using the Reference Application:
      1. The user opens the application and is prompted for a username, password, and phone number
      2. The Kandy server sends an SMS to the supplied phone number, with a validation code
      3. The user enters this code to complete the registration process
    com.genband.kandy.api.services.chats.KandyChatSettings.setDownloadMediaPath(File)
    use IKandyChatDownloadPathBuilder instead
    com.genband.kandy.api.services.groups.KandyGroupSettings.setDownloadMediaPath(File)
    use IKandyGroupDownloadPathBuilder instead
